Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.Server

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.Server.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    GameController is a runnable class implementing the game itself. An instance of GameController is used for only one game. Running in a separate thread it allows to handle multiple games without interference.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Vadym Nahrudnyy

      • Move

        private void Move()
           throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Handles the move phase of the player's turn. Selects the worker to move and then makes the moves itself, in case using god powers.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • Build

        private void Build()
            throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Handles Build phase of the turn. Checks the possible builds and sends them to the player.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • countPossibleMoves

        protected int countPossibleMoves​(boolean[][] possibleMoves)
        Counts the number of moves (move or build) a worker can make given a boolean matrix with allowed moves.
        Parameters:
        possibleMoves - Boolean matrix with allowed values.
        Returns:
        Integer number indicating the number of possible moves.

      • getOnlyMoveIndexes

        protected int[] getOnlyMoveIndexes​(boolean[][] possibleMoves)
        Looks for the matrix indexes of the only possible move on the board.
        Parameters:
        possibleMoves - Boolean matrix containing only one "true" value.
        Returns:
        Array of two integers standing for the indexes in the matrix where the move is possible.

      • selectWorkerHandler

        private void selectWorkerHandler()
        Selects the worker before making the move, if the worker can't be moved the other worker of the player is considered. In case both of them can't move, the player is removed from the game.

      • moveVictoryConditionSatisfied

        protected boolean moveVictoryConditionSatisfied()
        Checks if the current player has made a victory move.
        Returns:
        true if the player won, false otherwise.

      • checkWorkerMovedUp

        protected void checkWorkerMovedUp()
        After a move, checks if the worker moved up and set the corresponding flag.

                        int destY)
        Makes the move after receiving the destination coordinates from player and checking the validity of the response.
        Parameters:
        destX - Coordinate X of the destination space.
        destY - Coordinate Y of the destination space.

      • isVictoryMove

        protected boolean isVictoryMove()
        Verifies if the move has been made is a standard win move.
        Returns:
        "true" if a win move has been made, "false" otherwise.

        Checks if the current player's god has a specified power.
        Parameters:
        powerID - The ID of the power to check.
        Returns:

      • chooseGods

        private void chooseGods()
                 throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Selects the gods before start playing.It asks the first player the list of gods to use, then the others chose their god card and the first player automatically receives the remained god card.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • correctGodChose

        private boolean correctGodChose​(VirtualView firstVirtualView,
                                java.util.ArrayList<God> gameGods)
                         throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Asksthe first player the list of gods and checks the validity of the answer.
        Parameters:
        firstVirtualView - virtual view of the first player.
        gameGods - empty List where the gods will be inserted.
        Returns:
        a boolean value. True if the player has chosen the gods correctly.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

                           java.util.ArrayList<God> chosenGods)

        Parameters:
        gameGods - gods chosen to be used in game.
        chosenGods - gods chosen by other players.
        Returns:
        the god which will be used by the first player.

      • chooseStartPlayer

        private void chooseStartPlayer()
                        throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Asks the Challenger the username of the start player. If invalid input is detected it sends an error to the client.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

                            throws PlayerDisconnectedException

      • checkPossibleMoves

        private boolean[][] checkPossibleMoves​(int workerCoordinateX,
                                       int workerCoordinateY)
        Checks all the possible moves the worker can make.
        Parameters:
        workerCoordinateX - coordinate X of the selected worker.
        workerCoordinateY - coordinate Y of the selected worker.
        Returns:
        a boolean matrix with "true" value in the position where the worker can move.

      • checkPossibleBuilds

        protected boolean[][] checkPossibleBuilds​(int workerCoordinateX,
                                          int workerCoordinateY)
        Identifies the spaces a given worker can build in.
        Parameters:
        workerCoordinateX - coordinate x of the moved worker.
        workerCoordinateY - coordinate y of the moved worker.
        Returns:
        Boolean matrix with true value in the cells the worker can build.

        Parameters:

      • checkMessageValidity

        private boolean checkMessageValidity​(Message messageToCheck,
                                     int[] allowedMessages)
        Checks if the received message is among the messages can be used by the game controller at the moment in order to continue the game.
        Parameters:
        messageToCheck - is the received message.
        allowedMessages - the list of allowed messages
        Returns:
        a boolean value. True if the message is allowed, false otherwise.

      • verifyValidPosition

        protected boolean verifyValidPosition​(boolean[][] allowedPositions,
                                      int receivedX,
                                      int receivedY)
        Checks if the the client has chosen a valid position. This is first checked on player's side in order to ensure better performance and reduce socket load and then double checked on the server in order to ensure security.
        Parameters:
        allowedPositions - matrix of allowed positions.
        receivedX - Coordinate X received from the client.
        receivedY - Coordinate Y received from the client.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating with "true" that a valid move has been chosen by the client. false otherwise.

      • createWorker

        private void createWorker​(int numWorker,
                          Player owner,
                          int coordinateX,
                          int coordinateY)
        Creates a worker instance in the position indicated by the player.
        Parameters:
        numWorker - used to distinguish between first and second player's worker.
        owner - indicates the player who owns the created worker.
        coordinateX - X coordinate of the worker Position.
        coordinateY - Y coordinate of the worker Position.

        private boolean opponentHasPower​(int powerID)
        Checks if any of opponents of current player has a given power.
        Parameters:
        powerID - The power to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if an opponent has the indicated power, false otherwise.

        Gets a god by using his name
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getWorkerByCoordinates

        private Worker getWorkerByCoordinates​(int coordinateX,
                                      int coordinateY)
        Gets the worker in a selected Space
        Parameters:
        coordinateX - is the X coordinate of the selected Space.
        coordinateY - is the Y coordinate of the selected Space.
        Returns:
        the worker in desired place. The value is null in case no worker have been found in the space.

                                     Worker oneWorker)
        Gets the other worker of the player
        Parameters:

        oneWorker - is the worker we are considering
        Returns:

      • victory

        private void victory​(java.lang.String winnerUsername)
        Notifies to all players the winner of the game and disconnect them.
        Parameters:
        winnerUsername - Username of the winner.

      • workerCanMakeMove

        protected boolean workerCanMakeMove​(boolean[][] allowedMoves)
        Checks in the matrix indicating allowed moves if an action can be performed by the worker
        Parameters:
        allowedMoves - is previously created matrix indicating where the worker can move or build;
        Returns:
        a boolean value. True when an action can be performed, false otherwise.

      • removePlayerFromGame

        protected void removePlayerFromGame​(Player playerToRemove,
                                    VirtualView clientToRemove)
        Removes a player from the game. In case of two players game, the remained players wins the game, so the victory method is called in order to notify the winner. In three players game the player is removed from the list of players but still remains in virtual view list and received updates about the status.
        Parameters:
        playerToRemove - Player to remove from the game.
        clientToRemove - Virtual view of the player to remove.

      • removePlayersWorkers

        protected void removePlayersWorkers​(Player playerToRemove)
        Removes the workers of a player from the game.
        Parameters:
        playerToRemove - the player removed from the game.

      • waitValidMessage

        private void waitValidMessage​(VirtualView senderVirtualView,
                              int[] messageIDs)
                       throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Dequeue the messages waiting for a valid message. If the message is a disconnection, the game is stopped.
        Parameters:
        senderVirtualView - virtual view of the client from who the controller needs a message
        messageIDs - list of accepted messages.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • gameThreadWait

        private void gameThreadWait()
                     throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException

      • getSelectedWorker

        private Worker getSelectedWorker​(SelectWorkerResponse message)
        Gets the worker selected by the player. If the selected worker is invalid, sends an error message to the client.
        Parameters:
        message - received select worker response message.
        Returns:
        The selected worker, null if it's invalid

      • possibleArtemisSecondMoveDestinations

        protected boolean[][] possibleArtemisSecondMoveDestinations​(Space previousSpace,
                                                            Space currentSpace)
        Creates the boolean matrix of possible moves for the second move of the player having Artemis god card.
        Parameters:
        previousSpace - the position of the worker before the first move
        currentSpace - the current position of the worker
        Returns:
        boolean matrix indicating with true the position where the selected worker can move, false otherwise.

      • checkHestiaAllowedBuilds

        protected boolean[][] checkHestiaAllowedBuilds​(int workerX,
                                               int workerY)
        Builds the matrix of positions where a player having Hestia can build the second time (using the power of the card)
        Parameters:
        workerX - X coordinate of the moved worker.
        workerY - Y coordinate of the moved worker.
        Returns:
        boolean matrix with "true" in positions the worker can build.

      • getCurrentBoard

        protected IslandBoard getCurrentBoard()
        Method used to get the current game Board
        Returns:
        the current game board.

      • setDisconnectionDetected

        protected void setDisconnectionDetected()

      • useApolloPower

        protected void useApolloPower​(Worker destSpaceWorker)
        Uses Apollo's power.
        Parameters:
        destSpaceWorker - The worker to change position with.

      • useMinotaurPower

        protected void useMinotaurPower​(Worker destSpaceWorker,
                                int destX,
                                int destY)
        Uses Minotaur power.
        Parameters:
        destSpaceWorker - Worker to push into the next space in move direction.
        destX - Coordinate X of the destination space.
        destY - Coordinate Y of the destination space.

      • handleArtemisPower

        private void handleArtemisPower​(Space previousPosition)
                         throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Implements Artemis power. It checks if the power can be used and then send a request to the client.
        Parameters:
        previousPosition - the start position during first move of the worker selected by the player.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • handleDemeterPower

        protected void handleDemeterPower​(Space builtSpace)
                           throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Implements Demeter power. It checks if the power can be used and then sends the request to the player.
        Parameters:
        builtSpace - The space the player has previously built in.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • handleHephaestusPower

        protected void handleHephaestusPower​(Space BuildSpace)
                              throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Implements Hephaestus power. If the power can be used it sends to player a request. If the player wants to use the power, the height of the block previously built increments by one block.
        Parameters:
        BuildSpace - Space the player previously has built in.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • isPanVictoryMove

        protected boolean isPanVictoryMove()
        Verifies if a player has Pan's power then if the move made is winning.
        Returns:
        "true" if the move verifies Pan's win condition, "false" otherwise.

      • handlePrometheusPower

        protected void handlePrometheusPower()
                              throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Implements Prometheus power. It checks if the player has the power and if it's possible to use it. In this case, with Prometheus the power is usable only if the power does not lead to loose the game.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • handleAresPower

        protected void handleAresPower()
                        throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Implements Ares power. It checks if the player has the power, then if it's possible to use it, if yes it asks the player to use the power and finally removes the block from selected space.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • handleCronusPower

        protected void handleCronusPower()
        Checks if a player has Cronus god card and the if the victory condition is satisfied. In case the condition is satisfied it calls victory method.

      • victoryDeniedByHeraPower

        protected boolean victoryDeniedByHeraPower()
        Checks if the opponent has Hera's power and then verifies that the power can be used.
        Returns:
        "true" value if a victory can be denied the Hera power, "false" otherwise.

      • handleHestiaPower

        protected void handleHestiaPower()
                          throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Implements Hestia power. Checks if the power can be used and send a power usage request.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • secondBuildMake

        private void secondBuildMake​(boolean[][] allowedBuild,
                             VirtualView client)
                      throws PlayerDisconnectedException
        Handle the double build powers. Receives a matrix with allowed moves and asks the player if he want to use the power. If affirmative answer has been receives, the normal build process is made.
        Parameters:
        allowedBuild - matrix with allowed build positions.
        client - virtual view of the player.
        Throws:
        PlayerDisconnectedException - When a disconnection is detected.

      • checkPossibleRemovals

        protected boolean[][] checkPossibleRemovals​(int workerX,
                                            int workerY)
        Builds the matrix of possible blocks can be removed by Ares Power.
        Parameters:
        workerX - Coordinate X of the unmoved worker.
        workerY - Coordinate Y of the unmoved worker.
        Returns:
        boolean matrix indicating with true the spaces where a block can be removed, false otherwise.

      • checkPossiblePreBuild

        protected boolean checkPossiblePreBuild()
        Checks if a player having Prometheus god card can use the power without loosing the game.
        Returns:
        False if the use of the power leads to loosing the game, true otherwise.
